players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "I trust Diana's investigation. Alice is Mafia, we should vote her out."
Diana: "Alice is Mafia. I investigated her. We must vote her out now to win."

You: "I have been quiet until now, but I believe it's important to defend myself. Last night, I did not kill anyone, I was focusing on my role as a mafioso. Charlie's death is a unfortunate incident and I don't have any..."
Bob: "Alice just admitted to being Mafia. Vote Alice now."
